extendedInfo.description: Introducing PRIZE CLAW!. For years, you've been going to arcades and carnivals, trading quarters for the chance to grab toys and candy with a motorized claw. Claw games are filled with tense moments of wondering if the claw will drop your prize, coupled with the triumph of finally receiving it! PRIZE CLAW recreates that experience for your Android while adding many exciting new features! Step up to the machine and maneuver the claw to grab coins, gems, stuffed animals, cars, dolls, and so many more! This claw game is much more than the standard grabbing you get from arcade machines, however: PRIZE CLAW is filled with all sorts of unique items, powerful effects and challenging missions. Special gems grant you bonuses to enhance your collection power, and you can trade the prizes you collect for extra special bonuses. Tons of prizes aren't the only thing you can trade in: All the coins you collect can be spent to upgrade your claw, activate your unique powers and even customize your machine! If you run out of grabs, don't fret! It won't take long before you receive more. Keep checking back to complete your collection and unlock more stuff!Features:- More than 60 prizes to collect!- Multiple machines to play on with different prizes, powers and looks!- A special puzzle to complete for each machine!- New 3D graphics with customizable machines, claws and joysticks!- Simple to play but with tons of missions to challenge your skills!- Earn more bonuses for playing every day!- Huge variety of bonuses and effects!Check back for future updates!Search Keywords: prizes, free, carnival, arcade, missions, crane, crain, fun, cute, casual, coin, family, nostalgic, coin, 2013, January, games,

reviews.title: Fabulously addictive
reviews.comment: I have only been playing this game for a week but already I\'m hooked!  Very user friendly & greatly entertaining!
reviews.author: Louise Davies

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Love it! But it takes way to long to regenerate grabs when offline especially once you get to higher levels! I have to wait for over a day for my grabs to regen and then they only last maybe half an hour or so per machine. And there are also times that almost all of my grabs that I had been saving and waiting for disappeared! I should have over a hundred grabs on each machine I only have 10! And some kind of prize or bonus for completing the puzzles would be nice. Fix those and you\'ll have my 5 star rating!
reviews.author: Amy Pearson

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great game overall, n haven\'t gotten bored w it yet. Regen coins could come a lil faster, but lots of options for them. All in all, 5 stars bc it earned them.
reviews.author: Jenn M

reviews.title: Fun gam
reviews.comment: Whether you\'re any good at claw games in real life or not, this ones fun because you can almost always win something. And the things you can\'t always get, there\'s a way to get it!
reviews.author: Michael McClain

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: 1 of the best games I have ever played. I give u five stars again. I love this game! Thank you. Sharla
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Super addicting.  And fun. Just update the graphics, a lot! !!! But it\'s still fun
reviews.author: Kylee Jeffers

reviews.title: Addictively fun & fetching!
reviews.comment: Great graphics, prize bonuses, missions to complete, options to use coins to purchase claws, controllers & change look of machine. Huge variety of prizes to use for energy, extras. Just need an option to trade prizes for free grabs.
reviews.author: Ginger Williamson

reviews.title: Bummer on my phone
reviews.comment: Freezes every couple time I try to play and I have to pull my battery. Then the game resets back to level 1. Samsung Smart Tough phone. Have to uninstall
reviews.author: Diana Thunehorst

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: I really like it.. every nite me n my husbnd play this game, we like it... playing this game can release our tension. Good job guy
reviews.author: Yushanis Tahir

reviews.title: Shame because is fun no grabs as it was
reviews.comment: Why can\'t you buy grabs with coins anymore had this forever decided to play for the first time in while and no option to buy grabs with coins anymore when Grabs were scarce enough anyway. Now Got 100.000 coins with nothing to spend them on waste of time and effort. Why on earth can\'t you buy grabs with coins anymore because the developers are greedy that\'s why trying to force you to pay. people haven\'t got money to waste especially those with family to look after.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: A fantastic, addictive, realistic game! However you could improve this app, when the grabber almost grabs the item, it searches for the nearest prize and doesn\'t just leave without a prize. Please could you explain why this is.
reviews.author: Harry Armstrong

reviews.title: Resets itself to level one
reviews.comment: I did love this game until after reaching a high level, the top claw and the top joystick, it suddenly reset itself to level one.  I won\'t bother with it any more.
reviews.author: Sheila Clarke

reviews.comment: Addicting! Haven\'t had any problems with the claw. Cute prizes....fun for all ages
reviews.author: Emily Schrader

reviews.comment: Great Game
reviews.author: Nicki Decker

reviews.title: Fantastic game!
reviews.comment: I love this game! Entertaining for hours. Wish it\'d give you free grabs quicker.
reviews.author: amber godshall

reviews.title: Good to pass time
reviews.comment: This game is ok but made me mad when it started over on it\'s own and I was on a very high level
reviews.author: Patricia Burt

reviews.title: Wtf
reviews.comment: Got to level 50\'s and game restarted back at level 1 tried again got to level 10 and game started over after freazing my phone... use to be a fun pass time game. What happened...
reviews.author: DAVID DEMPE

reviews.title: Prize claw
reviews.comment: One this is a lot of fun. Wish it would load faster. I won\'t complain thoughts.
reviews.author: Michele Hock

reviews.title: Up for grabs.
reviews.comment: Great fun, you need a good eye and a steady hand. Make sure you know what to collect,  a good claw is worth getting.
reviews.author: Geoff Homewood

reviews.title: Addictive
reviews.comment: Brilliant fun would be five stars if you could get more grabs by trading either sets or coins but often can only play for half hour then out of grabs til next day
reviews.author: Debbie Waters
